message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair start.
I appreciate the offer, but I think a 52.5 / 47.5 split is more reflective of the diminishing value and time pressure.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to make a small concession, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
